products.name: Mouse Steelseries Rival 3
products.description: SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless uses new Quantum 2.0 Dual Wireless technology to deliver ultra-low latency wireless technology with 400+ hours of battery life, plus two types of wireless connectivity for pinpoint performance and year-round versatility.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air M1
products.description: The power of Apple's M1 processor completely revolutionizes Apple's thinnest and lightest laptop. Up to 3.5X faster CPU speeds. Up to 5x faster GPU speeds. The most advanced Neural Engine ever, for up to 9x faster machine learning. The longest battery life ever in a MacBook Air. And a silent, fanless design. Never seen so much power together and so portable.

products.name: Apple Macbook Pro M2
products.description: The Apple Macbook Pro doesn't know what it's like to be still. With the new M2 processor, the 13-inch MacBook Pro is more efficient than ever. It has the same compact design, up to 20 hours of battery life and an active cooling system for super-fast performance. It's the easiest Pro laptop to take with you and packs a stunning Retina display, FaceTime HD camera and studio-quality microphones.

Introducing the Logitech MX Master 3S, an iconic mouse reimagined for ultimate tactile feel, performance and fluidity.  Quiet clicking buttons offer a satisfying tactile feel with 90% less clicking noise. MX Master 3S now also features an 8K optical sensor for next-gen responsiveness on any surface, even glass.
products.name: Logitech MX Master 3S
Logitech MX Keys Mini
products.description: Apresentamos o Logitech MX Keys Mini, um teclado menor, mais inteligente e mais poderoso para os criadores. Digite com segurança neste teclado eficiente, estável e preciso. O design ergonómico alinha os seus ombros. Posicione o rato mais perto do teclado, sem precisar de esticar o braço, para maior conforto e uma melhor posição corporal.

products.name: Mi Curved Gaming 34"
products.description: Immerse yourself in an immersive and exciting gaming and entertainment experience with the 34" UltraWide Xiaomi Mi Curved Gaming Monitor, featuring WQHD resolution (3440 x 1440 pixels), extreme 1500R curvature and a high refresh rate of 144 Hz.

products.name: Equip Monitor Lamp
products.description: Equip's USB LED monitor light with suspension design, which adapts asymmetrical light path, reducing screen glare and effectively protecting your eyes. Snap-on design for installing the work lamp fits any monitor.  PC workplace eye-friendly lighting: the USB lamp is located on the top of the monitor, it only radiates downwards and forwards, perfectly and evenly illuminates the area in front of the monitor, infinitely adjustable color temperature and brightness through tactile buttons, you can adjust your personal light according to your needs and preferences.
